SCTX - Script Source:
scn mwBMStal01Script

begin onactivate
	SetStage fbmwBMEarth 30
	playsound3d 0BMSpipeSsmall
	if GetStage fbmwBMEarth >= 20
		if (fbmwBMEarth.soundpuzzlenumber == 1)&&(fbmwBMEarth.answerright == 2)
			set fbmwBMEarth.answerright to 3
		elseif (fbmwBMEarth.soundpuzzlenumber == 2)&&(fbmwBMEarth.answerright == 0)
			set fbmwBMEarth.answerright to 1
		elseif (fbmwBMEarth.soundpuzzlenumber == 2)&&(fbmwBMEarth.answerright == 3)
			set fbmwBMEarth.answerright to 0
			set fbmwBMEarth.soundpuzzlenumber to 3
		else
			set fbmwBMEarth.answerright to 0
		endif
	endif
end

	
;<CSEBlock>
;<CSECaretPos> 6 </CSECaretPos>
;</CSEBlock>
